In an era where boomer shooters are making a big comeback, they decide to revive their much-loved narrative driven boomer shooter franchise... as a hero based PvPvE extraction shooter. First: WHAT? Second: THE F**K? These industry people are so clueless it HURTS. Creating a boomer shooter with the pedigree of the Marathon trilogy and the graphical fidelity and polish of a AAA budget, capable of competing with the likes of the DOOM franchise, would practically be a license to print money. It's absolutely insane they decided to go in this direction. They very well could've added this in as a game play mode on top of a strong single player game (like Titanfall 2 did) if they really wanted the game to have it, but no, THIS IS IT. Whomever made this decision needs to be fired, preferably out of a cannon, because their stupidity cannot be overstated enough.
